description:
Samuel wants to move to Los Angeles to become an actor. He said he loves movies and would love to be in a romantic or dramatic film.

When I asked him what his favorite movie was, he said "The Weatherman." OK, I guess I was expecting something else!

Samuel is extremely personable and he has a deep voice.

"You know," I told him, "if the acting thing doesn't work out you should try for radio or voice work."

He also plays the violin and piano.

"I wanted to be a concert pianist," he said. "But that's pretty tough to break into."

Samuel has a nice swimmer's body with olive, Mediterranean skin. For a lean guy, he's got really broad shoulders and big lats.

Oh, and he has size 13 feet!
title: Samuel
